name: Altar Escape
description:
Altar Escape is a hardcore sci-fi FPS.

Your task is to escape from a space prison called Altar. The stranger will send you a letter and a weapon. He acts like your friend and signs like L. You try to get into the escape module, which is the only chance to escape.

The prison is actually a spaceship that is under attack and some parts of it are damaged.

Can you run away?
